title: Follow live: Knicks, Pacers in tight contest with Game 6 on the line
author: ESPN Staff

title: PSG rout Inter in record UCL final win for 1st title
description: Paris Saint-Germain won their first Champions League title with a 5-0 demolition of Inter Milan -- the biggest winning margin in the final of the competition.
author: Mark Ogden

title: New-look PSG make history on emotional night for Luis Enrique
description: Paris St-Germain's historic Champions League triumph became an emotional and poignant night for Luis Enrique, writes Phil McNulty.

title: Is Champions League defeat end of an era for Inter?
description: As Paris St-Germain dismantle Inter 5-0 to win their first Champions League - in the biggest final win ever - it could have given the Nerrazzuri a glimpse of what they could be - if many changes are afoot this summer.

title: Caitlin Clark among stars at Indiana Pacers vs. New York Knicks Game 6
description: The NBA playoffs bring out the biggest stars to support their team, including Caitlin Clark, who was seen at Game 6 of the Eastern Conference finals.

title: The Pittsburgh Steelers decided to bench Justin Fields for Russell Wilson in 2024.
description: The Pittsburgh Steelers benched the young field general part of the way into the season.

title: Piastri beats Norris to pole as McLaren seal front-row lockout in Spain
description: Oscar Piastri beat team-mate Lando Norris to pole position for the Spanish Grand Prix as McLaren sealed a front-row lockout.

title: Mardle calls on rivals to step up as 'Lukes' domination continues
description: Sky Sports Darts' Wayne Mardle believes the domination of Luke Humphries and Luke Littler will not slow down any time soon and has called for their rivals to "step up" and challenge them.
